Articles.Content:
I have Kethane Mod installed. I have a ship orbiting Mun with 1000 Kethane in it, but the converter will not work no matter what I do. Do I need fuel lines or anything else? (All Parts are cross feed compatible)

I will be uploading pictures later when I get home.
You don't necessarily need fuel lines, connect the convertor directly to a fuel tank. Go here for more: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35664-Kethane-Usage-and-Proper-Fuel-Routing
If you do use fuel lines, remember that the lines need to be placed going FROM the tank TO the converter, not the other way around.
